query.description: The name of a role

body.raw:
{
  "role_id": "6db86c8c-535c-45e4-b7d7-45049c39b69b",
  "name": "Zoo Keeper",
  "description": "Role for the person in charge of taking care of animals",
  "internal": true,
  "namespaces": []
}
